TEXT.TITLE: FLUOR <FLR> UNIT GETS CONSTRUCTION CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Fluor Corp said its Fluor Daniel unit received a contract from Union Carbide Corp <UK> covering design, procurement and construction of a 108 megawatt combined cycle cogeneration facility in Seadrift, Texas. The value of the contract was not disclosed. Reuter
